doc:
Shelley Plimpton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shelley_Plimpton 0 Shelley Plimpton (born February 27, 1947) is an American former actress and Broadway performer. She is perhaps best known for originating the role of Crissy in the off-Broadway production of Hair, a role she resumed when the production moved to Broadway in 1968. She is the mother of actress Martha Plimpton. Shelley_Plimpton ( born February_27_,_1947 ) is an_American_former_actress_and_Broadway_performer . She is_perhaps_best_known for originating the_role of Crissy in the_off-Broadway_production of Hair , a_role she resumed when the_production moved to Broadway in 1968 . She is the_mother of actress_Martha_Plimpton .
